DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the correlation between pH, base deficit, and lactate values when comparing venous and arterial blood samples in the pediatric population.
DOC.brief_title: Correlation of Arterial and Venous Lactate and Base Deficit Values
DOC.criteria: Patients requiring arterial access and peripheral access. Additionally, patients with a central venous catheter would be included. Patients who not require arterial access.
